1: Move to green square block B1.
2: Move the green triangle block B1 to the top left corner.
3: Move the green square block B1 to the top left corner.
4: Move the blue square block B1 upwards.
5: Move the yellow square block B1 to the top left corner.
6: Move the blue square block B1 upwards.
7: Move the pink triangle block B1 to the top left corner.
8: Back away from the yellow triangle block B1.
9: Back away from the green square block B1.
10: Grab the blue square block B1.
